The Photo Bureau also offers a photo database of NYU images available for purchase called the Picturebank.              Our Work   From award ceremonies and group photos, to lectures, student events and newly renovated space, the NYU photographers document the diverse moments and events that make up university life.   The Gallery highlights our recent work.        Schedule a Photo Shoot   Photo Bureau photographers can be booked for photo assignments on campus, within New York City, nationally or on any NYU global campus. To schedule a photo shoot use the online forms to submit a request.            Location and Hours   726 Broadway, 7th Floor    Room 706 (office)    Room 700 (studio)   212-998-6826    Weekdays: 9 AM–5 PM                              View Services        and Prices                                             Submit Service        Request Form                                             Search the NYU        Picturebank                                                                                                    Jayne Burke       Manager  212.998.6827   jayne.burke@nyu.edu                                              Photo Bureau Lab       Office  212.998.6826   photo.bureau@nyu.edu                                                                  Public Affairs      John Beckman                           Photo Bureau      Jayne Burke                                                            NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
